Apple Pie
Serves: 6-8 portions
Calories: 320

Ingredients:
2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
1/4 teaspoon salt
3/4 cup cold butter
5-6 large apples
1/2 or 3/4 cup sugar
1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon
2-3 tablespoons lemon juice
1 egg for brushing

Steps:
1. Mix 2 1/2 cups flour with 1/4 teaspoon salt
2. Cut in 3/4 cup cold butter until crumbly
3. Add 5-7 tablespoons cold water
4. Chill dough for 1/2 hour
5. Peel and slice 5-6 apples
6. Mix apples with 1/2 - 3/4 cup sugar and spices
7. Roll out dough, fill with apple mixture
8. Brush with beaten egg
9. Bake at 375Â°F for 45-50 minutes
